ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Respondent
Notes: 1 = Parent; 2 = Teacher; 3=Self; 4= Other; 5= Significant other; 6 = Parent 1; 7 = Parent 2; 999 = Not available

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
BASH Total Score
My friends would think I was crazy if I saw a therapist
Notes: 1 = Strongly Disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Slightly Disagree; 4 = Slightly Agree; 5 = Agree; 6 = Strongly Agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: If I had a problem, my friends could help me more than a therapist
Notes: 1 = Strongly Disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Slightly Disagree; 4 = Slightly Agree; 5 = Agree; 6 = Strongly Agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: If I had a problem I would solve it by myself
Notes: 1 = Strongly Disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Slightly Disagree; 4 = Slightly Agree; 5 = Agree; 6 = Strongly Agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: If I had a problem, my family would help me more than a therapist
Notes: 1 = Strongly Disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Slightly Disagree; 4 = Slightly Agree; 5 = Agree; 6 = Strongly Agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: Child: Even if I wanted to, I wouldn't have time to see a therapist / Parent: Even if I wanted to, I wouldn’t have time to get professional help for my child’s problem.
Notes: 1 = Strongly Disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Slightly Disagree; 4 = Slightly Agree; 5 = Agree; 6 = Strongly Agree; -99 = Missing

ElementDescription: Child: If I had a problem and told a therapist, he would not keep it secret / Parent: If I got professional help for my child’s problem, the problem would not be kept secret.
